page.title: 17THE HUNT
page.content: There are about sixty to seventy people in the hunt. It starts at a local farm. If they catch a fox it is taken back to the farm and then sent to the kennels in Sudbury for the dogs. The hunt is held about three times a year. A member of the Royal Family comes about twice a year, but no_one is told except the hunt members in case anti-hunt people come and protest. The cross_countries are held twice a year. There are sixteen jumps in the whole of the cross_country. All the people who have entered have to walk the course to make sure they know it properly. Everyone has to wear a skull cap or they cannot enter. A skull cap protects the head.
